Media.MediaTitle: Merkel - Relative ten year survival rates for MCC

ImageData.LabelName: Relative ten year survival rates for Merkel cell carcinoma by stage (SEER 1973-2006)

OriginalSource.Comment: From: J of Cutaneous Pathology on-line July 23, 2009

ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Relative ten-year survival rates for Merkel Cell Carcinoma by stage (SEER 1973–2006): Graph shows evidence of the differences in 10-year survival when MCC tumors were stratified by SEER stage. Includes percent survival (0%–100%) and survival months (0 months–120 months).

Captions.MediaCaption: Figure 3. Relative ten-year survival rates for Merkel Cell Carcinoma by stage (SEER 1973–2006). Albores-Saavedra J et al: Merkel cell carcinoma demographics, morphology, and survival based on 3,870 cases: A population-based study. J Cutan Pathol. Reprinted with permission © 2009. Published by Wiley-Blackwell. All rights reserved.
